p: Furocoumarins can be metabolised pre‐systemically in the small intestine of humans and laboratory animals (reviewed by Meluogh and Chun, 2018). Furocoumarins (8‐MOP) exhibited non‐linear kinetics and a saturable first‐pass effect in macaque monkeys, particularly relevant at the low doses (Rozman et al., 1989, as referenced in SKLM, 2006). Humans also exhibited a saturable first‐pass effect (Schmid et al. 1980 and Brickl et al., 1984, as referenced in SKLM, 2006).
